Name: Rh| BitLocker
Linux: Partial FUSE driver to read/write Windows BitLocker-ed volumes under Linux / Mac OSX

Name: Rh| Check Point Full Disk Encryption
Rh| CipherShed
FreeBSD: no Although CipherShed can be built under FreeBSD, it is not recommended to run it because of bugs and instabilities when CipherShed is attempted to be used
Android: yes Third party app allows to open containers encryptes with AES-256, SHA-512 hash and FAT file system

Name: Rh| CrossCrypt
Windows NT: yesCrossCrypt - Only for the Microsoft Windows XP/2000 operating systems

Name: Rh| Cryptainer
Windows Mobile (incl.Pocket PC): Yes PocketPC freeware release- SmartPhone beta available

Name: Rh| Cryptoloop
Windows NT: yes FreeOTFE supports cryptoloop, dm-crypt/cryptsetup/dmsetup, and dm-crypt/LUKS volumes

Name: Rh| CryptoPro Secure Disk for BitLocker
Rh| FileVault 2
Linux: partial libfvde supports reading FileVault2 Drive Encryption (FVDE) encrypted volumes

Name: Rh| LibreCrypt
Android: yes Third party app allows a user to open LibreCrypt compatible LUKS containers

Name: Rh| TrueCrypt
FreeBSD: no Although TrueCrypt can be built under FreeBSD, it is not recommended to run it because of bugs and instabilities when TrueCrypt is attempted to be used

Name: Rh| VeraCrypt
Android: yes Third party app allows to encrypt and decrypt VeraCrypt containers (only available in the paid version)
